name: 00075_00.jpg
describe: The garment is a white T-shirt featuring a prominent "Champion" logo across the chest. The logo is written in a cursive script, with the "C" in blue and red, and the rest of the word "Champion" in blue. The T-shirt has short sleeves and a crew neck. The tag inside the collar indicates that it is a size small. The fabric appears to be a standard cotton blend, suitable for casual wear.

name: 00345_00.jpg
describe: The garment is a white T-shirt featuring a bold, black, capitalized word "POLO" across the chest. The font is large and blocky, giving it a collegiate or sporty feel. The T-shirt has short sleeves and a crew neck. The fabric appears to be a standard cotton blend, suitable for casual wear. There is a small, dark-colored logo near the collar area, which reads "POLO" in a smaller, more refined font, indicating the brand of the shirt. The overall style is simple yet iconic, likely associated with a well-known fashion brand.

name: 00462_00.jpg
describe: The garment is a white T-shirt featuring a graphic print on the front. The print includes a stylized depiction of red roses with green leaves against a blue background. The word "OBEY" is prominently displayed across the center of the floral design in a bold, sans-serif font. The T-shirt has short sleeves and a crew neck. A small black tag is visible at the back of the neckline, indicating the brand or size information.

name: 00641_00.jpg
describe: The garment is a white short-sleeved T-shirt featuring a prominent logo on the front. The logo consists of the words "THE NORTH FACE" in bold, black capital letters, with the iconic black half-circle design integrated into the word "FACE". The T-shirt has a crew neck and appears to be made from a smooth, likely cotton blend fabric. The sleeves are rolled up to the elbows, revealing a ribbed edge at the cuffs. The overall style is casual and sporty, suitable for everyday wear.

name: 00739_00.jpg
describe: The garment is a white T-shirt featuring a graphic design across the chest. The design consists of four stylized symbols representing playing card suits: a red heart, a black spade, a red diamond, and a black club, each positioned to form the letters "KARL". The T-shirt has short sleeves and a round neckline. The fabric appears smooth and the colors are vibrant, with the reds and blacks standing out against the white background. The overall style is casual yet bold, with the graphic serving as a statement piece.

name: 01430_00.jpg
describe: The garment is a red T-shirt featuring a graphic print of two cherubic figures with wings, positioned above the brand name "FIORUCCI" in bold black letters. The T-shirt has a classic crew neck and short sleeves, with a slightly loose fit. The fabric appears to be a standard cotton material, suitable for casual wear. The design is simple yet eye-catching, combining a traditional angelic motif with modern branding.

name: 01689_00.jpg
describe: The garment is a short-sleeved dress with a floral print. The background color of the dress is a deep teal or dark green. The flowers are predominantly pink and white, with some green foliage interspersed throughout the design. The neckline is a simple round shape, and the fabric appears to be lightweight and possibly semi-sheer. There is a small label at the back of the neck area that reads "EVANS," indicating the brand of the dress. The overall style of the dress is casual and feminine, suitable for spring or summer wear.

name: 01853_00.jpg
describe: The garment is a white T-shirt featuring a bold graphic design. The design includes the phrase "FEMINIST AS FUCK" in large, red capital letters. Above the text, there is a stylized black graphic resembling a mouth with a tongue sticking out. The T-shirt has short sleeves and a round neckline. The fabric appears to be a standard cotton material, and there is a small black tag visible at the bottom left corner of the shirt.

name: 03032_00.jpg
describe: The garment is a black T-shirt featuring a graphic print on the front. The print includes a stylized depiction of a figure with long hair, wearing a veil, and dressed in what appears to be historical or classical attire. Above this graphic, the text "I DON'T CARE" is printed in bold, white capital letters. The T-shirt has a relaxed fit with short sleeves and a crew neckline.

name: 04743_00.jpg
describe: The garment is a white T-shirt featuring a large graphic print of Minnie Mouse. The print includes Minnie Mouse's iconic red dress, yellow shoes, black gloves, and a red bow on her head. Her arms are raised, and she has a cheerful expression. The T-shirt has short sleeves and a round neckline. The word "Disney" is visible at the top left corner of the shirt, indicating the brand collaboration.
